WPF blogs

13 February 2009

I am getting into more WPF programming, and a number of blogs out there are standout resources for learning:

  • BabySmash
  • devlicio.us

And some Microsoft resources:

  • The Layout System
  • Use Automatic Layout Overview
  • Panels Overview
